shapes.label: Entity generation shape
shapes.comment: An instance of prov:Generation provides additional descriptions about the binary prov:wasGeneratedBy relation from a generated prov:Entity to the prov:Activity that generated it. For example, :cake prov:wasGeneratedBy :baking; prov:qualifiedGeneration [ a prov:Generation; prov:activity :baking; :foo :bar ]. Generation is the completion of production of a new entity by an activity. This entity did not exist before generation and becomes available for usage after this generation.
